str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Adverb from the base of pou; an interrogative particle of manner; in what way?; also as exclamation, how much!

str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.

str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

str2: To open. From ana and oigo; to open up.

str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The eye; fig: the mind's eye. From optanomai; the eye; by implication, vision; figuratively, envy.

str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

str2: Apparently from ereo; to interrogate; by implication, to request.

Age, term of life; full age, maturity; stature. From the same as helikos; maturity.
